mapper.insert: insert into board ( c_no,user_no, board_title,board_content, create_date, update_date, board_hits ) values( #{cNo},#{userNo},#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},now(),now(),0 )
mapper.select: select b.board_no ,b.c_no ,c.c_name ,b.user_no ,u.user_name ,b.board_title ,b.board_content ,b.create_date ,b.update_date ,b.board_hits from board b inner join category c on b.c_no = c.c_no inner join user u on b.USER_NO = u.USER_NO where b.C_NO = #{cNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_HITS = BOARD_HITS + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{BNO}
